editions.name: Energy Drink
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Energy Drink is valued by top athletes, professionals, university students and travellers on long journeys all over the world

editions.name: Energy Drink Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: Wings without sugar: Sugarfree Red Bull is the Red Bull energy drink without sugar

editions.name: The Winter Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Winter Edition with the warmly spicy taste of Fuji Apple and Ginger
editions.alt_text: Red Bull Winter Edition Popsicle Image

editions.name: The Yellow Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Yellow Edition. Surprised by the exotic taste of Tropical Fruits

editions.name: The White Edition
editions.flavor_description: The tropical taste of Coconut combined with the taste of Blueberry and Red Bull wings

editions.name: The Red Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Red Edition with the fresh taste of Watermelon

editions.name: The Sea Blue Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Sea Blue Edition with the exciting taste of Juneberry
editions.alt_text: Red Bull The Sea Blue Edition - Image

editions.name: The Green Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Green Edition with the taste of exotic Cactus Fruit

editions.name: The Ice Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Ice Edition: Energy drink with notes of Blueberry, Vanilla and icy fresh eucalyptus

editions.name: The Apricot Edition
editions.flavor_description: Bull Apricot Edition offers a perfect blend of Apricot and Strawberry with notes of Peach

editions.name: The Peach Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Peach Edition: Energy drink with the taste of fresh Peach and nectarine
